Sentencas: Chromium poisoning rapidly degrades the performance of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) cathode materials with superior oxygen reduction kinetics, such as La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3 and La0.6Sr0.4CoO3.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Previously, LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 (LNF) demonstrated excellent resistance to chromium poisoning; however, it has relatively low electrocatalytic activity.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Here, we investigate the effect of Zn substitution on the B-site of LNF cathode and deliver La(Ni0.6Fe0.4)(1-x)ZnxO3-delta cathode materials with enhanced electrical and electrochemical properties.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: The ab initio first-principles calculations showed charged oxygen-vacancy defect formation energies of Zn-doped LNF (2.07 eV for La8Ni5-Fe2Zn1O24 and 1.83 eV for La8Ni4Fe3Zn1O24) are lower than those of undoped LNF (2.92 eV for La8Ni5Fe3O24).
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Various Zn-doped LNF materials are synthesized and tested for experimental validation of the DFT results.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity relaxation, temperature-programmed oxygen desorption, and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analysis indicate enhanced oxygen reduction kinetics for LNFZ(3)
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability
Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: At 700 degrees C, LNFZ(3) has 25.4% less polarization resistance and 52.3% higher maximum power density of an anode-supported SOFC than LNF.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Moreover, LNFZ(3) has the lowest polarization resistance compared with various studies reporting LNF cathode material.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: Furthermore, LNFZ(3) shows highly robust operation under accelerated chromium-poisoning conditions at 700 degrees C.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: The high performance and durability synergy makes the newly developed LNFZ(3)
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability

Sentencas: a promising cathode material for further commercial validation studies.
Titulo: Computational design and experimental realization of Zn substitution in Cr-poisoning resistant LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-δ solid oxide fuel cell cathode for enhanced performance and durability
